snippet: There are good technical reasons for doubting whether Germany will accomplish anything with the 1.50-ton submarines which, according to a dispatch from Paris, she is about to build or rather to assemble from standardized parts....
lead_paragraph: There are good technical reasons for doubting whether Germany will accomplish anything with the 1.50-ton submarines which, according to a dispatch from Paris, she is about to build or rather to assemble from standardized parts.
